channel.title: Blog of Deployo on Deployo
channel.description: Recent content in Blog of Deployo on Deployo

item.title: Manage Dokku on Linode using Deployo
item.description: I will show you how to install and use Dokku on a Linode instance and manage all that using Deployo. First you need to create a Linode instance. I chose the cheapest one which is only 5$ a month. After selecting an instance and clcking “Add this Linode!” button, your server will be created. Initially the server is empty, there is no operating system or anything there at all. To be able run anything on the node we have to install an operating system by deploying an Image.
